headline.main: DENIES RACE BIAS BY BRITISH HERE; Envoy Disputes Charge Made by Tobey and Business School Witnesses Before Senators

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 26 (AP) -- Amid a confusion of shouted charges and counter-charges, witnesses told the Senate movie investigating subcommittee today that persons of German, Jewish or South Irish ancestry were not wanted as employes at the British purchasing agency here.
abstract: Zanuck denies Govt has suggested propaganda use in army training films; Sen McFarland challenges Sen D W Clark to submit question on continuing Inquiry to Sen, hearing
